title: Has there been a television film in the 1950s called Trump that showed the construction of a firewall?
subtitle: An episode of the Western Series "Trackdown" included a character named Walter Trump who claimed to be building a wall to protect a city from the apocalypse.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In an episode of "Trackdown," a snake oil salesman named Trump, who promised to build a wall to prevent the world's apocalypse, was shown.
